IBD Method Group

Please RSVP!

Preparation:Please bring to the meeting a copy of the Word document Review of the Level One Material. It can be found in our meetup.com Files area here. Also, if you can please print out another copy of the document for others who do not RSVP, that would be welcome.

This month's agenda:
  • IBD Method Basics by Doug - We go over a basic aspect of the IBD Method.
  • Mike's Method - Mike shares his prospecting and insights
  • In-depth tickers - We have nobody currently scheduled to do in-depth reports on a single stock. If you will prepare one, please contact Doug.
  • Personal investing strategies - We need someone to volunteer to explain their investing strategy.
  • We will spend some time talking about succession planning for the period after June, when Doug is not the organizer.



Who We Are

This IBD Method focused group will keep people together who are currently learning and applying the IBD Method to their investing.

We are working on the material from the Level 1 and the Level 2 seminars. The Level 2 seminar provided a rich set of examples of what to do in circumstances where the stock being examined does not exactly fit the rules.

Only those seeking to learn the IBD Method should attend. You don't need to commit to going up to Level 4, but our overall goal will be to develop as many Level 4 candidates as possible.



Our activities:
  • We will review the material, the concepts, that underlie the IBD Methodology in order to develop IBD Levels expertise.
  • We will share our methods of finding IBD Method stocks.
  • We will perform projects in small teams as the opportunities arise.
  • We will share our expertise with the larger Boston IBD.




We are IBD-centric. That means:
  • That we will stick to accomplishing the IBD Method - utilizing CANSLIM. We will not have market talks, except to state the the current IBD market status.
  • We have our own Google Group - IBDLevels. This is a moderated discussion that is also an IBD centric Google Group and its home page says as much. Join it via this link: http://groups.google....
